original_title: If "The Room" Was An Action Movie
overview: Tommy Wiseau is an alien from space who crash lands onto planet earth to destroy the world until he accidentally meets the love of his life Lisa. Lisa secretly has an affair with Tommy's best friend Mark and the movie gets EPIC!!!!!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mAA6quDK6c8&ab_channel=Kvlthaven
tagline: THE MOST EPIC MOVIE OF A HISTORY
title: If "The Room" Was An Action Movie
